hadiths.text: This tradition has been narrated on the authority of Sufyan with the addition from Abd ar-Razzaq (one of the narrators) explaining the meaning of shikal as a bone whose right back foot and left front foot or left back foot and right front foot are white

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنْ صِفَاتِ الْخَيْلِ
